verses.verse: שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Hearken אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me רֹ֥דְפֵי <S%H7291><s%> Ro-de-fei to me ye that follow after צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek righteousness מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shei ye that seek יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <S%H5027><s%> hab-Bi-tu look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to צ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> tzur unto the rock חֻצַּבְתֶּ֔ם <S%H2672><s%> chutz-tzav-Tem, [whence] ye are hewn וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to מַקֶּ֥בֶת <S%H4718><s%> mak-Ke-vet and to the hole בּ֖וֹר <S%H953><s%> Bor of the pit נֻקַּרְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H5365><s%> nuk-kar-Tem. [whence] ye are digged

הַבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <S%H5027><s%> hab-Bi-tu Look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham אֲבִיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Chem, your father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to שָׂרָ֖ה <S%H8283><s%> sa-Rah and unto Sarah תְּחוֹלֶלְכֶ֑ם <S%H2342><s%> te-cho-lel-Chem; [that] bare כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad him alone קְרָאתִ֔יו <S%H7121><s%> ke-ra-Tiv, you for I called וַאֲבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> va-'a-va-re-Che-hu and blessed וְאַרְבֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H7235><s%> ve-'ar-Be-hu. him and increased ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Indeed נִחַ֨ם <S%H5162><s%> ni-Cham shall comfort יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, Zion נִחַם֙ <S%H5162><s%> ni-Cham he will comfort כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חָרְבֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H2723><s%> cha-re-vo-Tei-ha, all her waste places וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and he will make מִדְבָּרָהּ֙ <S%H4057><s%> mid-ba-Rah her wilderness כְּעֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> ke-'E-den, like Eden וְעַרְבָתָ֖הּ <S%H6160><s%> ve-'ar-va-Tah and her desert כְּגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> ke-gan- like the garden יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <S%H8342><s%> sa-Son joy וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chah and gladness יִמָּ֣צֵא <S%H4672><s%> yim-Ma-tze shall be found בָ֔הּ Vah, תּוֹדָ֖ה <S%H8426><s%> to-Dah therein thanksgiving וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and the voice זִמְרָֽה׃ <S%H2172><s%> zim-Rah. of melody ס sa-Mek

הַקְשִׁ֤יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> hak-Shi-vu Hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, unto me my people וּלְאוּמִּ֖י <S%H3816><s%> u-le-'um-Mi unto me O my nation אֵלַ֣י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai and הַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nu; and give ear כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For תוֹרָה֙ <S%H8451><s%> to-Rah for a law מֵאִתִּ֣י <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Ti תֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze, shall proceed וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֔י <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Ti, from me and I will make my judgment לְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> le-'or for a light עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim of the people אַרְגִּֽיעַ׃ <S%H7280><s%> 'ar-Gi-a'. to rest

קָר֤וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ka-Rov [is] near צִדְקִי֙ <S%H6664><s%> tzid-Ki My righteousness יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza is gone forth יִשְׁעִ֔י <S%H3468><s%> yish-'I, my salvation וּזְרֹעַ֖י <S%H2220><s%> u-ze-ro-'Ai and mine arms עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people יִשְׁפֹּ֑טוּ <S%H8199><s%> yish-Po-tu; shall judge אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אִיִּ֣ים <S%H339><s%> 'i-Yim the isles יְקַוּ֔וּ <S%H6960><s%> ye-kav-Vu, shall wait וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- about זְרֹעִ֖י <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'I upon me and on mine arm יְיַחֵלֽוּן׃ <S%H3176><s%> ye-ya-che-Lun. shall they trust

שְׂאוּ֩ <S%H5375><s%> se-'U Lift up לַשָּׁמַ֨יִם <S%H8064><s%> lash-sha-Ma-yim to the heavens עֵֽינֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Chem your eyes וְֽהַבִּ֧יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> ve-hab-Bi-tu and look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz upon the earth מִתַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat, Thahash כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For שָׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim beneath for the heavens כֶּעָשָׁ֤ן <S%H6227><s%> ke-'a-Shan like smoke נִמְלָ֙חוּ֙ <S%H4414><s%> nim-La-chu shall vanish away וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz and the earth כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <S%H899><s%> kab-Be-ged like a garment תִּבְלֶ֔ה <S%H1086><s%> tiv-Leh, shall wax old וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei-ha and they that dwell כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- in like כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> chen after that יְמוּת֑וּן <S%H4191><s%> ye-mu-Tun; therein shall die וִישֽׁוּעָתִי֙ <S%H3444><s%> vi-shu-'a-Ti but my salvation לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam shall be for ever תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh, become וְצִדְקָתִ֖י <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-Ti and my righteousness לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not תֵחָֽת׃ <S%H2865><s%> te-Chat. shall not be abolished ס sa-Mek

שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me יֹ֣דְעֵי <S%H3045><s%> Yo-de-'ei unto me ye that know צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek, righteousness עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am the people תּוֹרָתִ֣י <S%H8451><s%> to-ra-Ti [is] my law בְלִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bam; in whose heart אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- Nor תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> ti-re-'U fear חֶרְפַּ֣ת <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pat ye not the reproach אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh, of men וּמִגִּדֻּפֹתָ֖ם <S%H1421><s%> u-mig-gid-du-fo-Tam of their revilings אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- Nor תֵּחָֽתּוּ׃ <S%H2865><s%> te-Chat-tu. neither be ye afraid

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki like כַבֶּ֙גֶד֙ <S%H899><s%> chab-Be-ged like a garment יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <S%H398><s%> yoch-Lem shall eat them up עָ֔שׁ <S%H6211><s%> 'Ash, For the moth וְכַצֶּ֖מֶר <S%H6785><s%> ve-chatz-Tze-mer them like wool יֹאכְלֵ֣ם <S%H398><s%> yoch-Lem shall eat סָ֑ס <S%H5580><s%> Sas; and the worm וְצִדְקָתִי֙ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-Ti but my righteousness לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam shall be for ever תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh, become וִישׁוּעָתִ֖י <S%H3444><s%> vi-shu-'a-Ti and my salvation לְד֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> le-Dor from generation דּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1755><s%> do-Rim. to generation ס sa-Mek

עוּרִ֨י <S%H5782><s%> 'u-Ri Awake עוּרִ֤י <S%H5782><s%> 'u-Ri awake לִבְשִׁי־ <S%H3847><s%> liv-shi- put on עֹז֙ <S%H5797><s%> 'oz strength זְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> ze-Ro-a' O arm יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God ע֚וּרִי <S%H5782><s%> 'U-ri awake כִּ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> Ki-mei days קֶ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem, as in the ancient דֹּר֖וֹת <S%H1755><s%> do-Rot in the generations עוֹלָמִ֑ים <S%H5769><s%> o-la-Mim; of old הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> 'at- you הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> hi who הַמַּחְצֶ֥בֶת <S%H2672><s%> ham-mach-Tze-vet [Art] thou not it that hath cut רַ֖הַב <S%H7294><s%> Ra-hav Rahab מְחוֹלֶ֥לֶת <S%H2490><s%> me-cho-Le-let [and] wounded תַּנִּֽין׃ <S%H8577><s%> tan-Nin. dragon

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אַתְּ־ <S%H859><s%> 'at- you הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hi who הַמַּחֲרֶ֣בֶת <S%H2717><s%> ham-ma-cha-Re-vet [Art] thou not it which hath dried יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam, the sea מֵ֖י <S%H4325><s%> mei the waters תְּה֣וֹם <S%H8415><s%> te-Hom deep רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah; of the great הַשָּׂ֙מָה֙ <S%H7760><s%> has-Sa-mah that hath made מַֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <S%H4615><s%> ma-'a-mak-kei- the depths יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam, of the sea דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech a way לַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> la-'a-Vor to pass over גְּאוּלִֽים׃ <S%H1350><s%> ge-'u-Lim. for the ransomed

וּפְדוּיֵ֨י <S%H6299><s%> u-fe-du-Yei Therefore the redeemed יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יְשׁוּב֗וּן <S%H7725><s%> ye-shu-Vun, shall return וּבָ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-'u and come צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> tzi-yOn unto Zion בְּרִנָּ֔ה <S%H7440><s%> be-rin-Nah, with singing וְשִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chat joy עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam and everlasting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשָׁ֑ם <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sham; [shall be] upon their head שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <S%H8342><s%> sa-Son gladness וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chah and joy יַשִּׂיג֔וּן <S%H5381><s%> yas-si-Gun, they shall obtain נָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> Na-su shall flee away יָג֥וֹן <S%H3015><s%> ya-Gon [and] sorrow וַאֲנָחָֽה׃ <S%H585><s%> va-'a-na-Chah. and mourning ס sa-Mek

אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who מְנַחֶמְכֶ֑ם <S%H5162><s%> me-na-chem-Chem; I [even] I [am] he that comforteth מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who אַ֤תְּ <S%H859><s%> 'at you וַתִּֽירְאִי֙ <S%H3372><s%> vat-ti-re-'I you who [art] thou that thou shouldest be afraid מֵאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> me-'e-Noosh of a man יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut, [that] shall die וּמִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-mib-ben- and of the son אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man חָצִ֥יר <S%H2682><s%> cha-Tzir [as] grass יִנָּתֵֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> yin-na-Ten. [which] shall be made

וַתִּשְׁכַּ֞ח <S%H7911><s%> vat-tish-Kach And forgettest יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD עֹשֶׂ֗ךָ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Se-cha, thy maker נוֹטֶ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> no-Teh that hath stretched forth שָׁמַיִם֮ <S%H8064><s%> sha-ma-Yim the heavens וְיֹסֵ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> ve-yo-Sed and laid the foundations אָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> 'a-Retz of the earth וַתְּפַחֵ֨ד <S%H6342><s%> vat-te-fa-Ched and hast feared תָּמִ֜יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid continually כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, every day מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because חֲמַ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> cha-Mat of the fury הַמֵּצִ֔יק <S%H6693><s%> ham-me-Tzik, of the oppressor כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher as if כּוֹנֵ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> ko-Nen he were ready לְהַשְׁחִ֑ית <S%H7843><s%> le-hash-Chit; to destroy וְאַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> ve-'ai-Yeh where חֲמַ֥ת <S%H2534><s%> cha-Mat ;and where [is] the fury הַמֵּצִֽיק׃ <S%H6693><s%> ham-me-Tzik. of the oppressor

מִהַ֥ר <S%H4116><s%> mi-Har hasteneth צֹעֶ֖ה <S%H6808><s%> tzo-'Eh The captive exile לְהִפָּתֵ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> le-hip-pa-Te-ach; that he may be loosed וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor יָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut and that he should not die לַשַּׁ֔חַת <S%H7845><s%> lash-Sha-chat, in the pit וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יֶחְסַ֖ר <S%H2637><s%> yech-Sar should fail לַחְמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mo. nor that his bread

וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh But I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God רֹגַ֣ע <S%H7280><s%> ro-Ga' that divided הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, the sea וַיֶּהֱמ֖וּ <S%H1993><s%> vai-ye-he-Mu roared גַּלָּ֑יו <S%H1530><s%> gal-Lav; whose waves יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. [is] his name

וָאָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> va-'a-Sim And I have put דְּבָרַי֙ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai my words בְּפִ֔יךָ <S%H6310><s%> be-Fi-cha, in thy mouth וּבְצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> u-ve-Tzel thee in the shadow יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di of mine hand כִּסִּיתִ֑יךָ <S%H3680><s%> kis-si-Ti-cha; and I have covered לִנְטֹ֤עַ <S%H5193><s%> lin-To-a' that I may plant שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim the heavens וְלִיסֹ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> ve-li-Sod and lay the foundations אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz, of the earth וְלֵאמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-le-Mor and say לְצִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> le-tzi-Yon unto Zion עַמִּי־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-mi- Thou [art] my people אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah. you ס sa-Mek
